taxon.author: (Blackwall, 1852)
taxon.distribution: Macaronesia, Northern Africa, Europe, Turkey, Caucasus, Russia (Europe to South Siberia), Kazakhstan, Iran, Kazakhstan, Central Asia. Introduced to Canada, USA, Chile, Argentina, New Zealand

referenceObject.reference: Blackwall, J. (1852a). A catalogue of British spiders including remarks on their structure, function, economy and systematic arrangement. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (2) 9(49, 52, 44): 15-22, 268-275, 464-471; 10(57, 58): 182-189, 248-253.
